textContent:
it is still common that rich people use their money to make affluent people more affluent although government in other words

you might say in today's society many people can make use of the internet and learn everything however many people don't understand how to make the most of it.使い方わからん。underlying frame of thinking

政府の社会保障政策や経済の介入によって格差が小さくなっているの事実だが未だに裕福な人が、富裕層がさらに豊かになるようにお金を回すという仕組みは依然として変わっていない。

また、インター

it is still common that rich people use their money to make affluent people more affluent although government in other words
